about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Autumn 2022 Garden] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Mushroom Log Path
  • Fruitful Apple Trees
  • White Picket Fence
  • Poinsettia Bushes
  • Fairy Garden Mushrooms
  • Autumn Wheelbarrow
  • Red Wood Floor
  • Fall Forest Rug

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
